update.sql: CREATE TABLE `MatriculationExamEnrollment` ( `id` BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `ssn` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `email` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `phone` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `postalCode` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `city` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `nationalStudentNumber` BIGINT, `guider` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `enrollAs` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `numMandatoryCourses` INTEGER NOT NULL, `restartExam` BIT(1) NOT NULL, `location` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `message` VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, `canPublishName` BIT(1) NOT NULL, `student_id` BIGINT, `state` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT `MatriculationExamEnrollment_student_id` FOREIGN KEY (`student_id`) REFERENCES `Student` (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `MatriculationExamAttendance` ( `id` BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, `enrollment_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `subject` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `mandatory` BIT(1) NOT NULL, `retry` BIT(1) NOT NULL, `year` INTEGER NOT NULL, `term` INTEGER NOT NULL, `status` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `grade` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT `MatriculationExamAttendance_enrollment_id` FOREIGN KEY (`enrollment_id`) REFERENCES `Application` (`id`) );
